T04D3859-3:340b-15: yin no // da ni phyi rol gyi sems can
T04D3859-3:340b-16: yongs su smin par 'gyur ba'i 'bras bu bstan pa'i
T04D3859-3:340b-17: yin no // phyir / de thob nas /
T04D3859-3:340b-18: 'jig rten dag la'ang zhes bya ba smras te /
T04D3859-3:340b-19: de ltar bdag nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyi go 'phang
T04D3859-3:340b-20: de thob nas 'jig rten dag la'ang myur du de
T04D3859-3:340b-21: thob par byed par shog shig ces bsngo ba'i tshul
T04D3859-3:340b-22: bstan to // 'jig rten dag la'ang zhes bya ba
T04D3859-3:340b-23: ni sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying
T04D3859-3:340b-24: po can yin pas 'jig rten thams cad la yang
T04D3859-3:340b-25: spangs pa phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T04D3859-3:340b-26: ye shes phun sum tshogs pa'i 'bras bu 'thob pa'i
T04D3859-3:340b-27: skal pa rkyen ji lta ba bzhin du yod par
T04D3859-3:340b-28: bstan pa'i phyir 'jig rten dag la'ang zhes spyir smos
T04D3859-3:340b-29: so // phyi rol gyi sems can yongs su smin pa yang sred pa dang /
T04D3859-3:340b-30: longs spyod tsam gyi don la ma yin gyi sangs
T04D3859-3:340b-31: rgyas kyi go 'phang spangs pa phun sum tshogs pa
T04D3859-3:340b-32: dang ye shes phun sum tshogs pas rab tu phye
T04D3859-3:340b-33: ba'i sku gsum nyid la yongs su smin par bya
T04D3859-3:340b-35: shes rab sgron snang mun sel ces bya ba smras te /
T04D3859-3:340b-36: shes rab sgron snang zhes bya ba ni sngar //
T04D3859-3:340b-37: shes rab sgron mas rtogs bya rtogs med tshul //
T04D3859-3:340b-38: zhes smos pa nyid mtshon te /
T04D3859-3:340b-39: spangs pa phun sum tshogs pa bstan to //
T04D3859-3:340b-40: mun sel ces bya ba ni sngar tshig blo kun 'das zhes smos pa nyid mtshon te /
T04D3859-3:340b-41: ye shes phun sum tshogs pa bstan to //
T04D3859-3:340b-42: de gnyis kyis rab tu phye ba'i 'bras bu sku
T04D3859-3:340b-43: gsum myur du thob par byed par shog shig ces
T04D3859-3:340b-44: bsngo ba'i tshul bstan pa'i phyir /
T04D3859-3:340b-45: myur du byed par shog ces bya ba smras te /
T04D3859-3:340b-46: des ni 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i tshul gyis
T04D3859-3:340b-47: phyi rol gyi sems can yongs su smin par 'gyur
T04D3859-3:341a-1: 'thob par bsngo ba'i tshul bstan pa yin no //
T04D3859-3:341a-2: slob dpon legs ldan byed kyis nye bar sbyar ba
T04D3859-3:341a-3: dbu ma'i rtsa ba'i 'grel pa shes rab sgron ma
T04D3859-3:341a-4: las lta ba brtag pa zhes bya ba ste rab
T04D3859-3:341a-5: tu byed pa nyi shu bdun pa tha ma rgya
T04D3859-3:341a-6: cher 'grel pa slob dpon spyan ras gzigs brtul zhugs
T04D3859-3:341a-7: kyis nye bar sbyar ba rdzogs so /
T04D3859-3:341a-10: // / dbu ma'i rtsa ba'i tshig le'ur byas pa shes rab
T04D3859-3:341a-11: ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i chos mngon pa
T04D3859-3:341a-13: don dam pa'i de kho na yang dag par ston pa /
T04D3859-3:341a-14: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gsal bar byed pa /
T04D3859-3:341a-15: slob dpon bdag nyid chen po 'phags pa klu sgrub
T04D3859-3:341a-16: mi 'phrogs pa'i mkhyen rab dang thugs rjer ldan pa
T04D3859-3:341a-17: de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg pa bla na med pa'i
T04D3859-3:341a-19: rab tu dga' ba'i sa bsgrubs nas bde ba can gyi zhing du gshegs pa /
T04D3859-3:341a-20: 'jig rten gyi khams dang ba'i 'od ces bya bar
T04D3859-3:341a-21: de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'byung gnas 'od ces
T04D3859-3:341a-22: bya bar 'gyur bas mdzad pa de'i 'grel pa shes
T04D3859-3:341a-23: rab sgron ma theg pa mchog gi tshul sgrub par
T04D3859-3:341a-24: byed pa lta ba ngan pa'i dri ma sel bar
T04D3859-3:341a-25: byed pa rjes su dpag pa dang sun dbyung ba'i
T04D3859-3:341a-26: gsal ba dang de kho na ston pa /
T04D3859-3:341a-27: slob dpon btsun pa legs ldan byed 'phags pa spyan
T04D3859-3:341a-28: ras gzigs dbang phyug gi dam pa mchog brnyes pa
T04D3859-3:341a-29: / bdag dang gzhan gyi grub pa'i mtha' rgya mtsho'i
T04D3859-3:341a-30: pha rol tu byon pa rig sngags 'chang grub pa'i
T04D3859-3:341a-31: gnas khyad par can du gshegs pa /
T04D3859-3:341a-32: sku tshe 'di nyid kyis rdo rje'i gdan bgrod pa'i
T04D3859-3:341a-33: thugs dam can gyis nye bar sbyar ba rgya cher
T04D3859-3:341a-34: 'grel pa theg pa chen po dbu ma pa'i slob
T04D3859-3:341a-35: dpon yul sa ke tan nas byung ba /
T04D3859-3:341a-36: bram ze'i rigs shing s'a la chen po lta bu rig pa'i gnas mtha' dag chub pa /
T04D3859-3:341a-37: rang dang gzhan gyi grub pa'i mtha' thams cad la
T04D3859-3:341a-38: mkhas pa spyan ras gzigs brtul zhugs kyis nye bar
T04D3859-3:341a-41: // / dbang phyug dam pa'i mnga' bdag rgyal po chen po dpal lha btsan po'i bka' lung gis /
T04D3859-3:341a-42: rgya gar gyi mkhan po theg pa chen po dbu ma pa dzny'a na garbha dang /
T04D3859-3:341a-43: bod kyi zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba dge slong
T04D3859-3:341a-44: cog ro klu'i rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur cing zhu chen
T04D3859-3:341a-45: bgyis te gtan la phab pa /
T04D3859-3:341a-46: 'di la rab tu byed pa ni nyi shu rtsa bdun /
T04D3859-3:341a-47: shlo ka ni nyi khri bzhi stong yod /
